definitions.definition: An action or act; something that is done.
A brave or noteworthy action; a feat or exploit.
Action or fact, as opposed to rhetoric or deliberation.
definitions.example: I have fulfilled my promise in word and in deed.

definitions.definition: A legal instrument that is executed under seal or before witnesses.
definitions.example: I inherited the deed to the house.

definitions.definition: To transfer real property by deed.
definitions.example: He deeded over the mineral rights to some fellas from Denver.
